      • returnTrueIfRecipeIsNotPlannedAtDate

        public boolean returnTrueIfRecipeIsNotPlannedAtDate(java.lang.String date,
                                                    int recipeID)
        Functionality to check if Recipes have already been planned at a given date (user cannot add identical Recipes to same date).
        Parameters:
        date - Date to check recipe
        recipeID - RecipeID to check
        Returns:
        True if recipe is not planned, False if it is planned.
